Package ys.probabilistic.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Hasher<T>
    An abstraction of the idempotent hash function.
    LinearCounter<T>
    A probabilistic data structure to estimate the cardinality of the data set in a linear time and using a small amount of memory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AggregateLinearCounter<T>
    A LinearCounter that aggregates results from other linear counters.
    CountUtil
    Utilities for counting unique objects (cardinality).
    MurmurHashers
    A factory of the collision-resistant Hashers that are based on the murmur3 algorithm.
    SimpleHasher<T>
    A Hasher that is based on the standard Object.hashCode() implementation.
    WriteConcurrentLinearCounter<T>
    An implementation of LinearCounter that is lock-free for writers (they count values).
